com.opendxl.databus.consumer

Class ConsumerRecords<P>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opendxl.databus.consumer.ConsumerRecords<P>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<ConsumerRecord>

    public class ConsumerRecords<P>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<ConsumerRecord>
    This class contains a set of ConsumerRecord. It is returned by Consumer.poll(long). Since it implements Iterable the SDK user can iterate using a for structure.
